name: Ghoster! (Pheebles :0)
description:
Become friends with a little ghost called Ghoster! (i know what an original name)

It's a visual novel that will take like a minute to get through, and there's really nothing much to it - i'm just testing out how to use Ren'py with this cute lil ghost :o

I will probably make a real game with Ghoster once i've gotten the hang of making visual novels :D

Ghoster (in order)

Ghoster

Ghoster 2

29/05/2019 - Fixed some dialogue and fixed the end screen so that it actually shows up
